en:
欣喜若狂
(Xīnxǐ ruò kuáng)

ecstatic

Definitions of 欣喜若狂
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

adjective
    ecstatic
        欣喜若狂, 狂喜的

phrase
    jump out of one's skin
        欣喜若狂
